sentences.sContent: Beyond the prelature's adherence to the arcane ritual of corporal mortification, their views on women were medieval at best.
sentences.sContent_eng: Beyond the prelature's adherence to the arcane ritual of corporal mortification, their views on women were medieval at best.
sentences.sCn: 且不说这个教派固守着肉体惩罚的秘密仪式，他们对女人的看法充其量也只是中世纪的。

remMethod.val: corp(身体) + or + al → 身体的

trans.tranOther: of or relating to the body; bodily
a low rank in the army, air force etc
